title: How The NBA Might Ensure Sterling Sells The Clippers
teaser: NBA commissioner Adam Silver said he'll do everything in his power to ensure that LA Clippers owner Donald Sterling sells the team. Michael McCann, director of the Sports and Entertainment Institute at the University of New Hampshire School of Law, explains the NBA rules behind this.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
